last_episode_to_air.name: It's a Booviful Life
last_episode_to_air.overview: Oh imagines what his life would've been like if he'd never met Tip.

name: Home: Adventures with Tip & Oh
overview: Picking up where the 2015 film left off, this coming-of-age buddy comedy follows fearless Tip and overenthusiastic Oh, as they navigate the crazily combined human and alien culture they live in, finding adventure everywhere they go.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The galaxy's dynamic duo are back in this jam-packed series with outrageous laughs and tons of heart.

episodes.name: Boovin In
episodes.overview: Eager for family, Oh moves in with Tip, but finds his new home anything but sweet.

episodes.name: Sant-Oh
episodes.overview: When a heat wave hits, Oh plays Santa and devises a cool remedy.

episodes.name: Little Kisses
episodes.overview: To keep Oh from getting kisses from Lucy, Smek plots to expose his dirty kitty litter secret.

episodes.name: Snow Day
episodes.overview: After a snowstorm, scared Boovs prepare to flee Earth.

episodes.name: It's a Secret
episodes.overview: Tip tells Oh of Lucy's surprise birthday party, but Oh finds it hard to keep the secret.

episodes.name: Queen of Thighs
episodes.overview: Lucy, Tip and Oh shoot a viral video to top Pauline Pappernacky's, but it's popular for different reasons among humans and Boov.

episodes.name: Krunkle Krush
episodes.overview: Tip helps Oh get a date with Krunkle, but his certainty that she is the one and only and Krunkle's attitude upset Tip.

episodes.name: Beauty Tip
episodes.overview: Tip enters a beauty pageant to beat Pom Pom, and though Oh helps her, Tip questions the value of not being herself.

episodes.name: Boov Flu Blues
episodes.overview: Oh contracts the Boov flu, but Tip's idea of taking care of him may be misguided.

episodes.name: Get Me to the Gorg
episodes.overview: Oh is invited to the Gorg babies' party and he and Tip search many planets for the perfect gift.

episodes.name: Kung Boov
episodes.overview: Oh is bullied by anti-Boov kids, but when Tip convinces him to defend himself, Oh goes a little too far.

episodes.name: The Werewolves of Chicago
episodes.overview: Tip wants to be a werewolves for Halloween, but Oh misunderstands and brings home a wolf from the zoo.

episodes.name: The Gray Matter
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh go exploring and find the Lost Boovs, who are convinced the Gorg killed everyone long ago.

episodes.name: Fever Break
episodes.overview: Tip gets a fever and thinks she saw Donny kill Sharzod, which Oh finds hard to believe.

episodes.name: Wrinkly Humans People
episodes.overview: Tip's grandparents visit but hate Boovs for taking out their satellite TV; so Oh pretends to be a human.

episodes.name: Piggy Piggy
episodes.overview: Oh accidentally loses Pig, but Sharzod has decided Pig is her new hip accessory.

episodes.name: Struck Through the Heart
episodes.overview: Oh starts gathering an electrical charge but the only way to ground out is by touching another Boov.

episodes.name: Boov Up and Drive
episodes.overview: Officer Kyle catches Tip driving without a license; then Tip discovers how hard the Boov driving test is and how low Smek will go

episodes.name: Party of Slumber
episodes.overview: Oh insists on hosting a slumber party against Tip's wishes and Pom Pom tries to dominate it.

episodes.name: Paranoid Activity
episodes.overview: Oh is due a safety award, but friend Kyle goes overboard making sure Oh does nothing unsafe.

episodes.name: Angerdome
episodes.overview: Tip loses her temper, so Oh suggests a trip to the Angerdome, where she summons an equally angry foe.

episodes.name: Tush Twins
episodes.overview: Lucy and Sharzod become friends, so Tip does her best to break them up; with unintended consequences.

episodes.name: Sitting on Babies
episodes.overview: Tip babysits the Gorg babies, but her sitting skills come under question.

episodes.name: Best Frenemies
episodes.overview: Smek pretends to be Oh's friend to find out how to hurt him, but finds friendship hard to resist.

episodes.name: Podlings
episodes.overview: Oh hosts a Boov family reunion to reconnect with his podlings.

episodes.name: Dumpster Dining
episodes.overview: At Lucy's new craft shop, Tip and Oh's attempts to shield her from ridicule go awry.

episodes.name: Boy Boy Girl Band
episodes.overview: At a boy boy girl band concert, Tip and Oh accidentally ignite an inter-species crisis.

episodes.name: Lords and Lazers
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh battle K-Trong in a wild virtual reality game.

episodes.name: Tip's Deep Dish
episodes.overview: When Tip gets laryngitis before she can ask her crush Keanu to a dance, Oh steps in to help.

episodes.name: Garbage Day
episodes.overview: Oh invents a time machine so Tip can redo a very bad day.

episodes.name: Very Foreign Exchange Student
episodes.overview: Tip agrees to be Die-Anne's peace mentor but struggles to set a good example.

episodes.name: Pig's Tale
episodes.overview: Tip gets a new perspective on life when she and Pig switch bodies.

episodes.name: Big Brain Boov
episodes.overview: Stumped by one of Tip's math problems, Oh seeks help from the Big Brain Boov hive mind.

episodes.name: Pook Pooks
episodes.overview: Oh struggles with Tip's need for total "closest buds" comfort.

episodes.name: Waltor
episodes.overview: A lonely Oh makes an unlikely friend at the aquarium, then kidnaps him.

episodes.name: Out Foxed
episodes.overview: Disgusted by human-Boov friendships, Fox tries to separate Oh and Tip.

episodes.name: Le Grande Derriere
episodes.overview: Lucy is made head chef at a fancy Boov eatery, leaving Tip to manage the diner.

episodes.name: I'm Your Boovest Fan
episodes.overview: Oh learns about sports and fandom while rooting for a T-ball team.

episodes.name: Scared Crazy
episodes.overview: While Tip and Oh are camping, Kyle tells them a tale about a psycho Boov, terrifying Oh.

episodes.name: Superslushious
episodes.overview: After Oh reprograms her, Slushious becomes jealous of Tip.

episodes.name: Inside Jokings
episodes.overview: Tip struggles to explain to Oh the finer points of inside joke telling.

episodes.name: It's a Jungle in There
episodes.overview: When Oh entrusts Tip with a new plant, she carelessly turns it into a monster.

episodes.name: Dang You Saved My Life
episodes.overview: After Tip saves her life, Sharzod becomes obsessed with repaying the debt.

episodes.name: Boovsland Noir
episodes.overview: Private eye Kyle panics when Sharzod hires him to find her lost "Mojo."

episodes.name: Nuttypunny
episodes.overview: Tip gets a tough lesson in sportsmanship playing Oh's favorite Boov game.

episodes.name: JealOHsy
episodes.overview: Oh is racked by jealousy when he sees ex-flame Krunkle with another Boov.

episodes.name: Breakers
episodes.overview: Rowdy alien Breakers threaten Oh's dream theme park family vacation.

episodes.name: A Day Without Tech
episodes.overview: When Boov technology crashes, Oh, Tip and Lucy try some extreme wilderness fun.

episodes.name: Sacks o' Cash
episodes.overview: Eager to earn cash, Tip and Oh start an extraterrestrial taxi service.

episodes.name: Oh Give Me a Home
episodes.overview: When Julio kicks Smek out of the store closet, Oh tries to find him a new home.

episodes.name: The Cloud
episodes.overview: Tip goes overboard while using Oh's storage cloud to declutter her room.

episodes.name: Booverty
episodes.overview: Tip helps Oh prepare for his life-changing, dance-heavy Booverty ceremony.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The galaxy's dynamic duo are back in this jam-packed series with outrageous laughs and tons of heart.

episodes.name: Queen of Police
episodes.overview: As Queen of Police, Tip bans all rules, but soon learns why Boovs need them.

episodes.name: Roidian Prom
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh help Die-Anne attend her prom and tangle with her fiery mom.

episodes.name: Where the Koobish Roam
episodes.overview: Tip clashes with old-school Krunkle during a Koobish cattle drive.

episodes.name: Best Friendiversary
episodes.overview: When Oh lavishes her with anniversary gifts, Tip scrambles to reciprocate in kind.

episodes.name: Citizen Brain
episodes.overview: The Big Brains recruit Oh to answer queries about humans in the Hive Mind.

episodes.name: Liar Liar Pods on Fire
episodes.overview: Tip offers Oh advice on how to lie, but Oh's fibs soon spin out of control.

episodes.name: Chercophonie
episodes.overview: Tip faces a dilemma when Boov pop star Chercophonie promotes her awful singing.

episodes.name: Oh, Man, and the Sea
episodes.overview: While fishing, Donny tries to teach Oh how to control his emotions.

episodes.name: Hard to Gettings
episodes.overview: Oh has his tentacles full when the demanding Sharzod develops a crush on him.

episodes.name: Tummy Fish
episodes.overview: Tip helps Oh find a new Boov host for his adoring tummy fish parasites.

episodes.name: Stick with Me
episodes.overview: While goofy Stick tries to romance Tip, Oh keeps his pal Fox busy.

episodes.name: Family Feudings
episodes.overview: Oh builds a memory device to learn why Lucy and her sister hate each other.

episodes.name: Cats! The Planet
episodes.overview: Tip gets a lesson in loyalty when Pig is abducted by alien cat lady Janet.

episodes.name: Selfie-ish
episodes.overview: When her photos with Oh prove a hit online, Tip becomes a selfie addict.

episodes.name: Newbeings on the Block
episodes.overview: Oh grows jealous when Tip showers attention on their lovable new alien neighbor.

episodes.name: Juicy Gossip
episodes.overview: While trying to help Lucy join the gossipy Juicy Crew, Oh overshares.

episodes.name: Humanspeople Safari
episodes.overview: To restore her faith in mankind, Oh takes Tip on a Boov "humanspeople safari."

episodes.name: Happy Space Troopers
episodes.overview: Rejected by Pom Pom's troop, Oh and Tip form their own adventure club.

episodes.name: Krebbles Is Real
episodes.overview: To calm an upset Oh, Tip films new episodes of a kids show he believes is real.

episodes.name: Tip's Diary
episodes.overview: When Tip discovers Oh has been reading her diary, she plots revenge.

episodes.name: The Great Chicago Hot Dog Crisis
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh tell the story of how they helped Boovs and humans bond over hot dogs.

episodes.name: Wrinkly Humans Kids
episodes.overview: After drinking Boov crazy juice, Tip's elderly grandparents go wild.

episodes.name: True Romancings
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh compete to find the perfect date for the romance-deprived Lucy.

episodes.name: Hardcore Harbor
episodes.overview: At the water park, Tip exhausts herself saving Oh and Elrod from danger.

episodes.name: A Thuper Hero Thtory Part 1
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh race to stop Elrod before he can suck up Earth's water.

episodes.name: A Thuper Hero Thtory Part 2
episodes.overview: Tip and Ohmust rescue Chicago's humans after Elrod abducts them for their water content.

episodes.name: Friend Like Tip
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh meet new pals -- including two Boov! -- at a pop-up sneaker sale.

episodes.name: Like Mother, Like Pit of Fire
episodes.overview: Tip freaks out when her mom says they're just like each other.

episodes.name: Sticky Situation
episodes.overview: Tip gives her crush a major makeover before their date. Oh's over-the top antics embarrass

episodes.name: The Freshmans
episodes.overview: Tip at a party with the cool ninth graders.

episodes.name: Humanning
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh want to get nose rings -- and Mom says yes! But Oh doesn't have a nose.

episodes.name: Know It All
episodes.overview: Oh takes Tip to the Museum of Awesome and Ancient Alien Stuff.

episodes.name: Only the Lucky Survive
episodes.overview: A lucky charm gives Oh the courage to visit the spooky Temple of Zulga with Tip.

episodes.name: Sharsquad
episodes.overview: When Sharzod's squad snubs her, she vows to be a better friend.

episodes.name: Big Bad Love
episodes.overview: While promoting the Boovian Festival of Feelingness, Tip and Oh play matchmaker for two bullies.

episodes.name: The Milk Job
episodes.overview: Oh helps Donny find animals for his milk business.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Girl Day
episodes.overview: Tip discovers a new side of herself when she hangs out with Apple and Chelsea.

episodes.name: Cop College
episodes.overview: Boovian cop Kyle trains to become a Chicago police officer.

episodes.name: Walkaboov
episodes.overview: Terry sends Oh on a mystical mission to rediscover his Boovian roots.

episodes.name: Big Boy Boy
episodes.overview: To prove he's a big boy boy, Oh moves into the apartment upstairs.

episodes.name: No Age Like the Present
episodes.overview: Oh's "age bender" gadget turns Tip and her mom into 18-year-olds.

episodes.name: So Garfeldt
episodes.overview: Tip gets a job at Garfeldt's On-a-Fish Stand to prove she can be responsible.

episodes.name: The Secret Life of Oh
episodes.overview: What does Oh do all day while the Tuccis are away?

episodes.name: Beings Bad
episodes.overview: Tip's about to find out. Oh worries that his good behavior is making Tip look bad to her mom.

episodes.name: Rekindling Retreat
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh try to put the spark back in their friendship.

episodes.name: Trashbassador
episodes.overview: Smek runs against Traffic Cone Larry for trashbassador of Chicago.

episodes.name: Big Silly
episodes.overview: Smudge searches for his monster friend, Big Silly.

episodes.name: Smek Chills Out
episodes.overview: With the help of some smooth tunes, Julio and his buds teach Smek how to chill.

episodes.name: Not My Boy Brandon
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh befriend a bratty internet celebrity.

episodes.name: Shady Shawn
episodes.overview: Tip and Oh go camping with Mom and her new boyfriend, Yoga Shawn. But is he hiding something?

episodes.name: B.R.A.P.
episodes.overview: At open mic night, Oh uncovers a hidden talent: battle rapping!

episodes.name: It's a Booviful Life
episodes.overview: Oh imagines what his life would've been like if he'd never met Tip.
